reviews.review_msg: If you read the textbook and go to your labs you can get a good mark in this class no problem. The midterm and final were a breeze. Lectures are a waste of time because she practically reads from the textbook. Labs were harder, but you basically just have to go and you'll be fine.
I don't know what everybody's talking about, Natasha was awesome.  She sets you up to succeed, and if you bother to do the work, you'll do well.
Her TA's suck, they are nit picky, snobby, and hard markers. Bad combo!
This prof is no good! One of the worst teachers I have had in my 3 years in University. The fact that she is nice does not change the fact that she should NOT BE TEACHING... aviod her at all costs!!
Awesome prof! Totally helpful and always had time for questions.

Dr Ghosh made research methods fun. I liked that she used the text as it was easier to understand when I actually read it. She's really helpful and totally approachable. I agree, she should teach 300 level courses!

Yes, she copies straight out of the text book but lots of professors do that. Final exam was difficult. I enjoyed the class and thought she was very helpful when you approach her for help. I wish she taught 300 level Psych courses because I enjoyed being in her class.

she is copying the material from the book, useless to go to class, especially she talks fast and u cant write anything down. hardmarker, oh my god, average for one the assignment was 6 something out of 10. Is she retaliating or what?
Worst instructor I have had. she is not interested in the material she coveres, only follows exactly what's on the book, and the final exam was not fair at all.

She rushes.  DO not expect to learn much in lecture.  her slides are the textbook word for word.  If you study the text during the time u are scheduled for the lecture, you would learn more. She seems really nice and cheerful, but that doesnt help students learn the cirriculum.

Sarcastic and stubborn, difficult to approach. Repeats the textbook word-for-word in lecture, however she is fairly cheerful and you know exactly what to expect. Puts all slides online and checks WebCT regularly

By far one of the best professors I had. She is very friendly and encourages questions in class. She is also very approachable for help. Her final exam was hard and the wording for some of the questions was confusing. However, I still enjoyed the class and hope that she teaches some third year courses next semester. I HIGHLY recommand her!
super easy....she's so cool too...if you need to take psyc 201...take it with her....you'll get at least a B if you tried
very nice! she made the course easy to understand, and was very helpful throughout the whole course. really great teacher.
